00030 /* Example group ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00036 /************************** PRIVATE DEFINTIONS*************************/
00038 #define DMA_SIZE                16
00039 
00040 /************************** PRIVATE VARIABLES *************************/
00041 uint8_t menu[]=
00042         "********************************************************************************\n\r"
00043         "Hello NXP Semiconductors \n\r"
00044         "GPDMA demo \n\r"
00045         "\t - MCU: LPC17xx \n\r"
00046         "\t - Core: ARM CORTEX-M3 \n\r"
00047         "\t - Communicate via: UART0 - 115200 bps \n\r"
00048         "This example used to test GPDMA function by transfer data from Flash \n\r"
00049         "to RAM memory\n\r"
00050         "********************************************************************************\n\r";
00051 uint8_t menu2[] = "Demo terminated! \n\r";
00052 uint8_t err_menu[] = "Buffer Check fail!";
00053 uint8_t compl_menu[] = "Buffer Check success!";
00054 
00055 //DMAScr_Buffer will be burn into flash when compile
00056 const uint32_t DMASrc_Buffer[DMA_SIZE]=
00057 {
00058         0x01020304,0x05060708,0x090A0B0C,0x0D0E0F10,
00059         0x11121314,0x15161718,0x191A1B1C,0x1D1E1F20,
00060         0x21222324,0x25262728,0x292A2B2C,0x2D2E2F30,
00061         0x31323334,0x35363738,0x393A3B3C,0x3D3E3F40
00062 };
00063 
00064 uint32_t DMADest_Buffer[DMA_SIZE];
00065 
00066 // Terminal Counter flag for Channel 0
00067 __IO uint32_t Channel0_TC;
00068 
00069 // Error Counter flag for Channel 0
00070 __IO uint32_t Channel0_Err;
00071 
00072 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00073 void DMA_IRQHandler (void);
00074 
00075 void print_menu(void);
00076 void Buffer_Init(void);
00077 void Error_Loop(void);
00078 
00079 /*----------------- INTERRUPT SERVICE ROUTINES --------------------------*/
00080 /*********************************************************************/
00085 void DMA_IRQHandler (void)
00086 {
00087         // check GPDMA interrupt on channel 0
00088         if (GPDMA_IntGetStatus(GPDMA_STAT_INT, 0)){ //check interrupt status on channel 0
00089                 // Check counter terminal status
00090                 if(GPDMA_IntGetStatus(GPDMA_STAT_INTTC, 0)){
00091                         // Clear terminate counter Interrupt pending
00092                         GPDMA_ClearIntPending (GPDMA_STATCLR_INTTC, 0);
00093                                 Channel0_TC++;
00094                 }
00095                 if (GPDMA_IntGetStatus(GPDMA_STAT_INTERR, 0)){
00096                         // Clear error counter Interrupt pending
00097                         GPDMA_ClearIntPending (GPDMA_STATCLR_INTERR, 0);
00098                         Channel0_Err++;
00099                 }
00100         }
00101 }
00102 
00103 /*-------------------------PRIVATE FUNCTIONS-----------------------------*/
00104 /*********************************************************************/
00109 void print_menu(void)
00110 {
00111         _DBG(menu);
00112 }
00113 
00114 
00115 /*********************************************************************/
00120 void Buffer_Verify(void)
00121 {
00122         uint8_t i;
00123         uint32_t *src_addr = (uint32_t *)DMASrc_Buffer;
00124         uint32_t *dest_addr = (uint32_t *)DMADest_Buffer;
00125 
00126         for ( i = 0; i < DMA_SIZE; i++ )
00127         {
00128                 if ( *src_addr++ != *dest_addr++ )
00129                 {
00130                         /* Call Error Loop */
00131                         Error_Loop();
00132                 }
00133         }
00134 }
00135 
00136 
00137 /*********************************************************************/
00142 void Error_Loop(void)
00143 {
00144         _DBG(err_menu);
00145 
00146         /* Loop forever */
00147         while (1);
00148 }
00149 
00150 
00151 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION--------------------------------*/
00152 /*********************************************************************/
00157 int c_entry(void)
00158 {
00159         GPDMA_Channel_CFG_Type GPDMACfg;
00160 
00161         /* Initialize debug via UART0
00162          * – 115200bps
00163          * – 8 data bit
00164          * – No parity
00165          * – 1 stop bit
00166          * – No flow control
00167          */
00168         debug_frmwrk_init();
00169 
00170         // print welcome screen
00171         print_menu();
00172 
00173         /* GPDMA block section -------------------------------------------- */
00174     /* Disable GPDMA interrupt */
00175     NVIC_DisableIRQ(DMA_IRQn);
00176     /* preemption = 1, sub-priority = 1 */
00177     NVIC_SetPriority(DMA_IRQn, ((0x01<<3)|0x01));
00178 
00179     /* Initialize GPDMA controller */
00180         GPDMA_Init();
00181 
00182         // Setup GPDMA channel --------------------------------
00183         // channel 0
00184         GPDMACfg.ChannelNum = 0;
00185         // Source memory
00186         GPDMACfg.SrcMemAddr = (uint32_t)DMASrc_Buffer;
00187         // Destination memory
00188         GPDMACfg.DstMemAddr = (uint32_t)DMADest_Buffer;
00189         // Transfer size
00190         GPDMACfg.TransferSize = DMA_SIZE;
00191         // Transfer width
00192         GPDMACfg.TransferWidth = GPDMA_WIDTH_WORD;
00193         // Transfer type
00194         GPDMACfg.TransferType = GPDMA_TRANSFERTYPE_M2M;
00195         // Source connection - unused
00196         GPDMACfg.SrcConn = 0;
00197         // Destination connection - unused
00198         GPDMACfg.DstConn = 0;
00199         // Linker List Item - unused
00200         GPDMACfg.DMALLI = 0;
00201         // Setup channel with given parameter
00202         GPDMA_Setup(&GPDMACfg);
00203 
00204         /* Reset terminal counter */
00205         Channel0_TC = 0;
00206         /* Reset Error counter */
00207         Channel0_Err = 0;
00208 
00209         _DBG_("Start transfer...");
00210 
00211         // Enable GPDMA channel 0
00212         GPDMA_ChannelCmd(0, ENABLE);
00213 
00214         /* Enable GPDMA interrupt */
00215         NVIC_EnableIRQ(DMA_IRQn);
00216 
00217         /* Wait for GPDMA processing complete */
00218         while ((Channel0_TC == 0) && (Channel0_Err == 0));
00219 
00220         /* Verify buffer */
00221         Buffer_Verify();
00222 
00223         _DBG(compl_menu);
00224 
00225     /* Loop forever */
00226     while(1);
00227     return 1;
00228 }
00229 
00230 /* With ARM and GHS toolsets, the entry point is main() - this will
00231  allow the linker to generate wrapper code to setup stacks, allocate
00232  heap area, and initialize and copy code and data segments. For GNU
00233  toolsets, the entry point is through __start() in the crt0_gnu.asm
00234  file, and that startup code will setup stacks and data */
00235 int main(void) {
00236         return c_entry();
00237 }

00239 #ifdef  DEBUG

00241  * @brief               Reports the name of the source file and the source line number
00242  *                              where the CHECK_PARAM error has occurred.

00244  * @param[in]    line assert_param error line source number
00245  * @return              None
00246  *******************************************************************************/
00247 void check_failed(uint8_t *file, uint32_t line) {
00248         /* User can add his own implementation to report the file name and line number,
00249          ex: printf("Wrong parameters value: file %s on line %d\r\n", file, line) */
00250 
00251         /* Infinite loop */
00252         while (1)
00253                 ;
00254 }
